show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #10, Sarah Bangert "Networking is the Key to Success"
subtitle: #10, Sarah Bangert "Networking is the Key to Success"
summary:
Our Friend from South west Colorado Sarah Bangert joins us today to talk about herding goats in the mountains and how prescribed grazing services work.

www.rxgrazingservices.com
